::CyberShark::

    He followed Battera, but figured it would ba fight, so =
he cloaked before going outside. He aimed his gun at Bloodystrike and fired=
 two missles, he then rushed him with his blade hand but colapsed, when he =
got up he was nearly completly visable. He attacked with his blade hand.
  =
----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Yanshosh@... 
  To: nbwrpg@egroup=
s.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, September 06, 2000 5:48 PM
  Subject: Party's Ove=
r, Maximals!



       
       My Groups | nbwrpg Main Page | Start a new g=
roup!  


  ::Reptilica/DevilDuer/Bloodystrike::

  "Party's over, Maximals=
!" Reptilica's voice sounds over the battlefield as he 
  flies in, firing =
a missile. The missile hits behind Deemos, sending dirt and 
  rocks flying=
 toward the Maximal.

  "That was a warning shot. If you don't get otta her=
e, a few more are gonna 
  hit a few of you," he says, firing two more miss=
iles, these ones aimed at 
  Deemos. He activates his comm-link, setting it=
 to transmitt to both Predacon 
  and Alliance frequences.

  "Everyone," h=
e says into it, "Zardus sent us here to help the Preds. Fire 
  only on Max=
imal signatures." The command was meant for the Alliance, the 
  explanatio=
n for the Preds.
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  DevilDuer runs jumps out int=
o the clearing, transforming in the air, and 
  firing his pistol at Infect=
ra.

  "Run, Maxi! While ya can!" he yells, firing repetedly at her.
  ~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  Bloodystrike flies into the scene, a heavy-fire rif=
le in one hand and a 
  rapid-fire one in the other. He opens fire on Doom =
Ice's ship, five shots 
  from the heavy-fire and 13 from the automatic.

 =
 "Zardus, we've engaged the Maxi's," he says into his comm, sending the 
  =
transmission to Zardus.
